plot outline: The Story is about the Short Tempered College chairman and his Angelic Girlfriend,but her father "a police Officer" didn't like him because he's like a Con,all time he Create issues and it ends in Fight.As a Father he wanted to protect her,from that kind of boyfriend,so he uses his police Power to Destroy the protagonist.
title: Utraan
plot: Revolving around a college romance, _Utraan_ (qv) tells the story of students whose lives turn upside down after a certain incident. Vijay gets into a series of life-threatening troubles because of his love with Nandini.

The Story is about the Short Tempered College chairman and his Angelic Girlfriend,but her father "a police Officer" didn't like him because he's like a Con,all time he Create issues and it ends in Fight.As a Father he wanted to protect her,from that kind of boyfriend,so he uses his police Power to Destroy the protagonist.
